p: The study was approved by the Local Ethical Committee of State Budgetary Healthcare Institution of Novosibirsk Oblast “Municipal Infectious Diseases Hospital No. 1” (protocols no. 1 of March 28, 2017). Peripheral blood of the HIV-infected individuals was sampled by the medical staff of the “Krasnoyarsk Regional Center for Prevention and Control of AIDS,” with pretest and posttest psychological consultations. Epidemiologic data were collected by a professional epidemiologist from individuals under the study after they were acquainted with the project goals.
